title: Socialists vs. Progressives: You Don’t ‘Transform’ What You Love | 2/27/20
description:
Bernie’s radicals are always active, and their brand of socialism is like "Game of Thrones" feudalism: The elites prosper and only the collective matters. Glenn breaks down the revolutionary track records of Bernie’s top campaign staff and how Democrats must put an end to this. Masks come off as the mayor of Myrtle Beach, South Carolina, proudly calls his crowd a “bunch of socialists.” And a new survey found that a fourth of Europeans say Israel’s policies help them understand anti-Semitism. While no Democrat is in first place, can Joe Biden win South Carolina? And as the world wakes up to coronavirus, the U.S. gets its first case of unknown origins, reinfection risk may be higher than expected, and … Romney.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
